mapper.sql: SELECT sei.e_name e_name, swi.w_name w_name , stf.enterprise_id enterprise_id, stf.warehouse_id warehouse_id, '' time, DATE_FORMAT(stf.optime,'%Y-%m-%d') time, 0 period, DATE_FORMAT(stf.optime,'%Y-%u') time, 1 period, DATE_FORMAT(stf.optime,'%Y-%m') time, 2 period, DATE_FORMAT(stf.optime,'%Y') time, 3 period, sum( CASE stf.direction WHEN 'I' THEN cast(stf.weight AS signed ) ELSE 0 END ) i_weight, sum( CASE stf.direction WHEN 'E' THEN cast(stf.weight AS signed ) ELSE 0 END ) e_weight FROM s_stock_flow stf LEFT JOIN s_enterprise_info sei ON stf.enterprise_id = sei.id LEFT JOIN s_warehouse_info swi ON stf.warehouse_id = swi.id
mapper.select:
GROUP BY enterprise_id, warehouse_id
,time
HAVING time = (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(#{optime}, '%Y-%m-%d') time) HAVING time = (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(#{optime},'%Y-%u') time) HAVING time = (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(#{optime},'%Y-%m') time) HAVING time = (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(#{optime},'%Y') time)
order by time desc
